description: Stoney HS Thermo Pants Men. Windproof and waterproof 2-layer MAMMUT DRYtechnology Pro material for protection in all weathers. The 60 g Ajungilak OTI Element filling provides warmth while the temperature can also be regulated via two side zippers. The leg hem is cut slightly shorter at the front for a better fit when wearing ski boots.
name: Mammut Stoney HS Thermo Pants, Short - Mens
